Posts.Content: Hi I have just been diagnosed,I am finding it very hard to get my head around the fact I have breast cancer,I have to have a mastectomy on my right breast which is making me feel in limbo,I don't know how I am meant to be reacting,people look at me funny because I am not breaking down in tears,I can't seem to feel anything at the moment,but I have for the last two days have been and keep feeling sick and have no energy,I don't find that I can sleep all through the night at the moment either,I have my first session tomorrow with the Macmillan nurse,but don know what to expect
Posts.Title: Scared off breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Carmen thank you for your kind words they mean a lot ,I spoke with Macmillan nurse today and me and my husband feel so much calmer now we know what to expect,and it does help knowing I can talk to others who have or are going through BC xx
Posts.Title: Scared off breast cancer

Posts.Content: HI cg28 it is the most upsetting thing to have to go through,but it does help having you and others on this site to talk to,it's nice to know I am not along with having to deal with BC, I hope everything goes well for you on the 1st march may god be with you xx
Posts.Title: Scared off breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you Kate g for your kinds words mean a lot xx
Posts.Title: Scared off breast cancer
